data.name: To the Stars
data.detailed_description:
In To the Stars, you're the founder of the ultimate space adventure travel agency. Your business has one goal: to give gullible tourists a vacation worth dying for! Which they just might…



Make your own path through procedurally generated galaxies, choosing which stars to visit. Decide how you interact with their inhabitants to create your own whimsical choose-your-own-adventure story.

Not everyone you encounter will be friendly. Defend your hapless tourists in satisfying, but easy-to-understand tactical combat.

Unlock dozens of quirky aliens, each with their own unique abilities. Will you take Corgo the Miner, who can lay asteroid debris in the path of enemies? Or the sly smuggler Zelbob, a cunning master of manipulation? Or keep it simple and bring GRONK's massive ion cannon?

Endless replayability in procedurally generated galaxies




Whimsical choose-your-own-adventure story




Recruit quirky aliens to your crew of adorable misfits
data.about_the_game:
In To the Stars, you're the founder of the ultimate space adventure travel agency. Your business has one goal: to give gullible tourists a vacation worth dying for! Which they just might…



Make your own path through procedurally generated galaxies, choosing which stars to visit. Decide how you interact with their inhabitants to create your own whimsical choose-your-own-adventure story.

Not everyone you encounter will be friendly. Defend your hapless tourists in satisfying, but easy-to-understand tactical combat.

Unlock dozens of quirky aliens, each with their own unique abilities. Will you take Corgo the Miner, who can lay asteroid debris in the path of enemies? Or the sly smuggler Zelbob, a cunning master of manipulation? Or keep it simple and bring GRONK's massive ion cannon?

Endless replayability in procedurally generated galaxies




Whimsical choose-your-own-adventure story




Recruit quirky aliens to your crew of adorable misfits
data.short_description: Explore a strange galaxy, recruit funky aliens and discover weird worlds! Fight off hostile warships in exciting and easy-to-understand space combat! Most importantly, give your flock of gullible tourists the space tour of a lifetime…
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3/AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 5000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
